name: Apidae
description: Apidae Token is a token allowing the preservation of bees by investing the funds collected in beekeeping equipment to promote the increase of colonies and make it easier for amateurs to enter the world of beekeeping. The goal of the Apidae token is to realize a project with decentralized applications on blockchain. The funds collected with the Apidae token will allow the breeding, the maintenance of the next colonies and livestock, the production of honey as well as the production of swarms that can be sold to other beekeepers to make up for their annual losses. In addition to all this, the Apidae token will facilitate the participation and the implication of people who have neither the technical capacity, the time nor the space to contribute to this action.
